results.title: Simvastatin/Ezetimibe Therapy for Recalcitrant Alopecia Areata: An Open Prospective Study of 14 Patients
results.text_hl: In several case reports, @DISEASE_Alopecia @DISEASE_MESH:D000505 @@@AT@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Alopecia_universalis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537055 @@@AU@@@ were successfully treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin/ezetimibe@@@, indicating that this combination could be a new, effective therapy for @DISEASE_Alopecia_Areata @DISEASE_MESH:D000506 @@@AA@@@.
